discourse_list.title: E-star name for Consensus Layer upgrade after Deneb

content.content: An E-star name is likely needed for the Consensus Layer upgrade after Deneb, (e.g. Electra) upgrade could possibly be for the Verge + other features. The consensus layer uses star names for upgrades whilst the execution layer uses Devcon cities. See: Post-Merge Network Upgrade Naming Schemes Upcoming upgrade names:    Shapella (Shanghai + Capella)   Dencun (Cancun + Deneb)  Making the next upgrade after that likely to be Prague + E star name. @protolambda has already suggested Practra (Prague + Electra)  Electra would then be a great follow-up star name: Electra is a star in the Taurus constellation (bull after bear  )  (Apologies if I am stepping on the process for selecting star upgrade names as I’m not a core dev)   E Star names From: List of proper names of stars - Wikipedia  Ebla Edasich Electra Elgafar Elkurud Elnath Eltanin Emiw Enif Errai    Poll Poll is for signaling purposes only.    Preferred star name  Ebla Edasich Electra Elgafar Elkurud Elnath Eltanin Emiw Enif Errai     0 voters
content.GPT-summary: The post explains that a new name is needed for the Consensus Layer upgrade after Deneb and suggests using a star name, with Electra being a popular choice. The post also includes a poll for users to vote on their preferred star name. There is no third-party feedback or collaboration mentioned in the post.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: Pari suggested that the name for Eletra + Prague should be “Petra”, which sounds much nicer and pronounceable than Practra.
